name: search_restaurants
description: Search for restaurants by location, cuisine, price range, and dietary needs. Returns structured results with ratings, addresses, and contact details.

query.description: Free-form search query for restaurants (e.g., "best pizza near Times Square", "romantic dinner spot")

location.description: City or area to search (e.g., "New York", "San Francisco", "Chicago")

price_range.description: Price level. Valid values: "$" (budget), "$$" (moderate), "$$$" (upscale), "$$$$" (fine dining). Default: "$$"

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-10, default: 5)
